mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu(menu_id, parent_id, name, path, type, icon) values (#{menu.menuId}, #{menu.parentId}, #{menu.name}, #{menu.path}, #{menu.type}, #{menu.icon})
mapper.update: update sys_menu set parent_id=#{menu.parentId}, name=#{menu.name}, path=#{menu.path}, type=#{menu.type}, icon=#{menu.icon} where menu_id = #{menu.menuId}
mapper.select: select menu_id, name from sys_menu where parent_id = 0
